title: Turning Over At Night Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Turning Over At Night Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Turning Over At Night Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 112
items.arabic: ((لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللَّهُ الْوَاحِدُ الْقَهّارُ، رَبُّ السَّمَوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الْعَزيزُ الْغَفَّارُ)).
items.transliteration: La ilaha illal-lahul-wahidul-qahhar, rabbus-samawati wama baynahuma, alAAazeezul-ghaffar.
items.translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, The One, AL-Qahhar.Lord of the heavens and the Earth and all between them, The Exalted in Might, The Oft-Forgiving.)(AL-Qahhar:The One Who has subdued all of creation and Whom all of creation are subservient to.  All movements occur by His will.

description_ar: من الأذكار والأدعية الصحيحة: دعاء تقلب النائم ليلاً
